name: Cheese and Tomato Pizza
description: A timeless classic featuring a rich tomato sauce base, generously topped with melted mozzarella cheese. Simple, yet utterly delicious.

name: Four Square Pizza
description: Enjoy variety with our Four Square Pizza! Each quadrant offers a different delicious topping combination, perfect for sharing or sampling multiple flavors.

name: Grilled Chicken Pizza
description: Savory grilled chicken pieces, perfectly seasoned and layered over a tangy tomato sauce with melted mozzarella and often bell peppers or onions.

name: Hawaiian Pizza
description: A delightful blend of sweet and savory, this pizza features juicy pineapple chunks and savory ham (or turkey ham) on a cheesy tomato base.

name: Mortadella Pizza
description: An authentic Italian taste experience with thinly sliced, delicate Mortadella, often complemented by pistachios or creamy ricotta over a light tomato sauce.

name: Sausage Pizza
description: A hearty and flavorful pizza topped with crumbled or sliced savory sausage, rich tomato sauce, and a generous layer of melted mozzarella cheese.

name: Smoked Chicken Pizza
description: Tender, flavorful smoked chicken pieces combined with a smoky BBQ or tomato sauce, melted cheese, and often red onions for a truly satisfying pizza.

name: Sriracha Pizza
description: For those who like it hot! This pizza features a spicy Sriracha-infused sauce or drizzle, often with toppings like chicken, jalape√±os, and onions for an extra kick.

name: Vegetarian Pizza
description: A wholesome and delicious pizza loaded with a colorful medley of fresh garden vegetables such as bell peppers, mushrooms, olives, onions, and tomatoes.

name: Veggie Pizza
description: A delightful pizza packed with a vibrant assortment of fresh vegetables, melted cheese, and our classic tomato sauce. A healthy and tasty option.
